snippet: A well-known crime figure was shot dead in Dublin this week in the latest gangland killing to afflict the Irish capital. Police are linking the murder to an underworld war involving dissident Republican militants.
abstract: A well-known crime figure was shot dead in Dublin this week in the latest gangland killing to afflict the Irish capital. Police are linking the murder to an underworld war involving dissident Republican militants.

headline.main: Drugs and Politics Stoke Ireland Gang War
